specials.name: Predictable!
specials.description: Hei-Fen rolls Perception against a target’s Deception DC.

specials.name: (F)
specials.description: Trigger: Hei-Fen’s Strike hits a flat-footed creature and deals damage.
The chosen effect lasts until the end of Hei-Fen’s next turn.

specials.name: Sneak Attack
specials.description: Hei-Fen deals an extra 3d6 points of precision damage against creatures that are flat-footed. On the first round of combat, creatures that haven’t acted are flat-footed to Hei-Fen.

specials.name: Light Step
specials.description: Hei-Fen ignores difficult terrain when Striding or Stepping.

specials.name: Deny Advantage
specials.description: Hei-Fen is not flat-footed to hidden, undetected or flanking creatures of level 12 or lower.
